byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Richard D. Kinder has come a long way from founding a small company that bought the castoffs of his former employer, Enron.
snippet: Richard D. Kinder has come a long way from founding a small company that bought the castoffs of his former employer, Enron.
lead_paragraph: Richard D. Kinder has come a long way from founding a small company that bought the castoffs of his former employer, Enron.

headline.main: El Paso Takeover Crowns a Career of Deal-Making
